title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.11 - Entire bill to be arbitrated
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.11 - Entire bill to be arbitrated

State Regulations

The entire bill of a hospital, including items of medical
care contained therein, shall be arbitrated by the hospital arbitration
committee. Items of medical care are subject to the medical fee
schedule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
